NewsArticle.Title: Balanced Arena
NewsArticle.Content: On Friday the 13th, the Balanced Arena will be released. All aislings that enter the arena will have their hit and mana points turned to 150K HP & 60K MP. Requirement to enter: 1. Registered Players Only 2. Insight 97+ 3. Location - South Pravat Entrance (near the fountain) *The arena will be in Beta the first 2 weeks of release. Players can test out the arena and receive Legend Marks and a gift for testing the Arena multiple times. Players are welcome to send in comments/suggestions on how the Balanced Arena can be improved. DA Team
